20110101140153.000|20110101140156.333|TR0|
20110101140156.333|20110101140159.667|TR0|A Tupolev-154 was being used on
20110101140159.667|20110101140203.000|TR0|Kolavia flight 348 bound for
20110101140203.000|20110101140205.500|TR0|Moscow. The aircraft is Russia's
20110101140205.500|20110101140208.000|TR0|most successful ever plane with
20110101140208.000|20110101140210.500|TR0|around a thousand of them
20110101140210.500|20110101140213.000|TR0|produced since 1968.
20110101140213.000|20110101140215.500|TR0|
20110101140215.500|20110101140218.000|TR0|The three-engine medium range
20110101140218.000|20110101140220.500|TR0|passenger plane was once the
20110101140220.500|20110101140223.000|TR0|work-horse of Russia's domestic
20110101140223.000|20110101140225.500|TR0|aviation, and many still remain
20110101140225.500|20110101140228.000|TR0|in use today
20110101140228.000|20110101140230.500|TR0|
20110101140230.500|20110101140233.000|TR0|It reaches speeds of over 900
20110101140233.000|20110101140235.500|TR0|kilometres per hour and is among
20110101140235.500|20110101140238.000|TR0|the fastest in its class.
20110101140238.000|20110101140240.500|TR0|
20110101140240.500|20110101140243.000|TR0|Despite being criticised for its
20110101140243.000|20110101140245.500|TR0|safety record, experts say pilot
20110101140245.500|20110101140248.000|TR0|error rather than technical
20110101140248.000|20110101140250.500|TR0|faults have been to blame for
20110101140250.500|20110101140253.000|TR0|most fatal incidents.

20110101141330.500|20110101141333.000|TR0|

20110101141420.500|20110101141423.000|TR0|you are on welfare in Estonia,
20110101141423.000|20110101141426.333|TR0|you simply cant make ends meet."
20110101141426.333|20110101141429.667|TR0|
20110101141429.667|20110101141433.000|TR0|The gap in living standards
20110101141433.000|20110101141435.500|TR0|within the European Union is
20110101141435.500|20110101141438.000|TR0|huge but it may get even bigger.
20110101141438.000|20110101141440.500|TR0|Estonia now have to contribute
20110101141440.500|20110101141443.000|TR0|800 mln euros to the EU

20110101141448.000|20110101141450.500|TR0|Irelands lavish social

20110101141500.500|20110101141503.000|TR0|

20110101141510.500|20110101141513.000|TR0|others Living standards in
20110101141513.000|20110101141515.500|TR0|Estonia are 63 percent of the
20110101141515.500|20110101141518.000|TR0|European average, in Ireland
20110101141518.000|20110101141520.500|TR0|they are 120 percent"
20110101141520.500|20110101141523.000|TR0|
20110101141523.000|20110101141525.500|TR0|When Estonia joined the European
20110101141525.500|20110101141528.000|TR0|Union in 2004, most of its
20110101141528.000|20110101141530.500|TR0|residents saw the membership as
20110101141530.500|20110101141533.000|TR0|their ticket to prosperity. The
20110101141533.000|20110101141536.333|TR0|country drastically cut social

20110101141543.000|20110101141545.500|TR0|provoked little public

20110101141548.000|20110101141550.500|TR0|tightened their belts - and,

20110101141759.667|20110101141803.000|TR0|
20110101141803.000|20110101141805.500|TR0|Fireworks have become something
20110101141805.500|20110101141808.000|TR0|of a seasonal tradition - but
20110101141808.000|20110101141810.500|TR0|treating burns has become a
20110101141810.500|20110101141813.000|TR0|seasonal chore for hospitals.
20110101141813.000|20110101141815.500|TR0|
20110101141815.500|20110101141818.000|TR0|As Igor Ogorodnev explains,
20110101141818.000|20110101141820.500|TR0|cheap, sub-standard and lethal
20110101141820.500|20110101141823.000|TR0|fireworks can lead to horrific

20110101141825.500|20110101141828.000|TR0|
20110101141828.000|20110101141830.500|TR0|Two decades after consumer
20110101141830.500|20110101141833.000|TR0|fireworks were first imported
20110101141833.000|20110101141835.500|TR0|into Russia, they have become an
20110101141835.500|20110101141838.000|TR0|essential part of the festive
20110101141838.000|20110101141840.500|TR0|tradition.

20110101141843.000|20110101141845.500|TR0|This holiday season Russians
20110101141845.500|20110101141848.000|TR0|will be setting off nearly a
20110101141848.000|20110101141850.500|TR0|hundred million dollars worth of
20110101141850.500|20110101141853.000|TR0|fireworks in their backyards.
20110101141853.000|20110101141856.333|TR0|And hundreds of them will end up
20110101141856.333|20110101141859.667|TR0|here - in the burns unit.
20110101141859.667|20110101141903.000|TR0|
20110101141903.000|20110101141905.500|TR0|Vadim Barclaya, Emergency
20110101141905.500|20110101141908.000|TR0|Medical Services Centre A huge
20110101141908.000|20110101141910.500|TR0|problem is that many of these
20110101141910.500|20110101141913.000|TR0|amateur-use fireworks do not
20110101141913.000|20110101141915.500|TR0|work as advertised. For example,
20110101141915.500|20110101141918.000|TR0|a firework doesn't ignite when
20110101141918.000|20110101141920.500|TR0|it's meant to, people pick it up
20110101141920.500|20110101141923.000|TR0|and then it explodes. Burns, eye
20110101141923.000|20110101141925.500|TR0|damage, blown off fingers - we
20110101141925.500|20110101141928.000|TR0|get it all here.
20110101141928.000|20110101141930.500|TR0|
20110101141930.500|20110101141933.000|TR0|Authorities say there is not
20110101141933.000|20110101141935.500|TR0|enough control over the quality
20110101141935.500|20110101141938.000|TR0|of the fireworks, which can be
20110101141938.000|20110101141940.500|TR0|sold anywhere by anyone. To find
20110101141940.500|20110101141943.000|TR0|out if some of the fireworks
20110101141943.000|20110101141945.500|TR0|really are unsafe, I've decided
20110101141945.500|20110101141948.000|TR0|to pay a visit to a popular
20110101141948.000|20110101141950.500|TR0|Moscow store. With their
20110101141950.500|20110101141953.000|TR0|colourful packaging these
20110101141953.000|20110101141955.500|TR0|Chinese-made imports are aimed
20110101141955.500|20110101141958.000|TR0|at casual pyrotechnics
20110101141958.000|20110101142000.500|TR0|enthusiasts. Prices are
20110101142000.500|20110101142003.000|TR0|dirt-cheap - less than ten
20110101142003.000|20110101142006.333|TR0|dollars for an entire display. I
20110101142006.333|20110101142009.667|TR0|buy a few for testing by
20110101142009.667|20110101142013.000|TR0|professionals.
20110101142013.000|20110101142015.500|TR0|
20110101142015.500|20110101142018.000|TR0|NIkita Bukin, Expert Most of
20110101142018.000|20110101142020.500|TR0|these fireworks do not comply
20110101142020.500|20110101142023.000|TR0|with Russian legislation. For
20110101142023.000|20110101142025.500|TR0|example look at this parachute
20110101142025.500|20110101142028.000|TR0|firework. It's meant to go up
20110101142028.000|20110101142030.500|TR0|straight, but it goes up at an
20110101142030.500|20110101142033.000|TR0|angle. It might seem trivial,
20110101142033.000|20110101142035.500|TR0|but not if it flies off in the
20110101142035.500|20110101142038.000|TR0|wrong direction and hits you.
20110101142038.000|20110101142040.500|TR0|
20110101142040.500|20110101142043.000|TR0|Authorities admit rogue imports
20110101142043.000|20110101142045.500|TR0|do get through, but insist that
20110101142045.500|20110101142048.000|TR0|it is up to people to at least
20110101142048.000|20110101142050.500|TR0|try to buy from licensed
20110101142050.500|20110101142053.000|TR0|suppliers. Still, although some
20110101142053.000|20110101142055.500|TR0|of the injuries will be from

20110101142100.500|20110101142103.000|TR0|expect to receive around a
20110101142103.000|20110101142105.500|TR0|hundred patients these holidays.
20110101142105.500|20110101142108.000|TR0|
20110101142108.000|20110101142110.500|TR0|But they will hope to avoid
20110101142110.500|20110101142113.000|TR0|large-scale mishaps to match the

20110101142116.333|20110101142119.667|TR0|Lame Horse night club just over
20110101142119.667|20110101142123.000|TR0|a year ago that killed more than

20110101142125.500|20110101142128.000|TR0|
20110101142128.000|20110101142130.500|TR0|I've heeded the numerous
20110101142130.500|20110101142133.000|TR0|warnings, so this year I am

20110101142140.500|20110101142143.000|TR0|
20110101142143.000|20110101142145.500|TR0|In just over 10 minutes' time
20110101142145.500|20110101142148.000|TR0|RT's traveller James Brown hits
20110101142148.000|20110101142150.500|TR0|the road again, this time
20110101142150.500|20110101142153.000|TR0|heading to the ancient city of
20110101142153.000|20110101142155.500|TR0|Kostroma to immerse himself in
20110101142155.500|20110101142158.000|TR0|legends and age-old activities.
20110101142158.000|20110101142200.500|TR0|
20110101142200.500|20110101142203.000|TR0|A rich aroma of saffron marks
20110101142203.000|20110101142205.500|TR0|all celebrations in Indian
20110101142205.500|20110101142208.000|TR0|Kashmir.
20110101142208.000|20110101142210.500|TR0|
20110101142210.500|20110101142213.000|TR0|But as it turns out, farmers are
20110101142213.000|20110101142215.500|TR0|struggling to preserve the
20110101142215.500|20110101142218.000|TR0|costliest spice in the world, as
20110101142218.000|20110101142220.500|TR0|heavy industries and poor
20110101142220.500|20110101142223.000|TR0|irrigation facilities damage
20110101142223.000|20110101142226.333|TR0|crops.
20110101142226.333|20110101142229.667|TR0|
20110101142229.667|20110101142233.000|TR0|Karan Singh explains.
20110101142233.000|20110101142235.500|TR0|
20110101142235.500|20110101142238.000|TR0|Saffron is a spice synonymous
20110101142238.000|20110101142240.500|TR0|with Kashmir. Costing 4,000 US
20110101142240.500|20110101142243.000|TR0|dollars a kilogram, this prized
20110101142243.000|20110101142245.500|TR0|ingredient is used in medicine
20110101142245.500|20110101142248.000|TR0|and South Asian cuisine. But the
20110101142248.000|20110101142250.500|TR0|saffron farmers in Pampore are
20110101142250.500|20110101142253.000|TR0|an unhappy lot, with the yield
20110101142253.000|20110101142255.500|TR0|half what it was a decade ago.
20110101142255.500|20110101142258.000|TR0|They blame the dozen cement
20110101142258.000|20110101142300.500|TR0|factories that have been set up
20110101142300.500|20110101142303.000|TR0|nearby.
20110101142303.000|20110101142305.500|TR0|
20110101142305.500|20110101142308.000|TR0|24-29 "These factories don't use
20110101142308.000|20110101142310.500|TR0|pollution control  devices. You
20110101142310.500|20110101142313.000|TR0|can see them spewing out dust 24
20110101142313.000|20110101142315.500|TR0|hours a day. We are working hard
20110101142315.500|20110101142318.000|TR0|to keep our fields fertile and
20110101142318.000|20110101142320.500|TR0|increase their yields. But the
20110101142320.500|20110101142323.000|TR0|government doesn't take any
20110101142323.000|20110101142325.500|TR0|action against these cement
20110101142325.500|20110101142328.000|TR0|plants."
20110101142328.000|20110101142330.500|TR0|
20110101142330.500|20110101142333.000|TR0|The fallout is that every year
20110101142333.000|20110101142336.333|TR0|sees less snowfall than the
20110101142336.333|20110101142339.667|TR0|last, affecting the crop. Many
20110101142339.667|20110101142343.000|TR0|farmers say they are even
20110101142343.000|20110101142345.500|TR0|thinking of selling their land.
20110101142345.500|20110101142348.000|TR0|
20110101142348.000|20110101142350.500|TR0|STAND-UP: " The biggest
20110101142350.500|20110101142353.000|TR0|long-term challenge is the
20110101142353.000|20110101142355.500|TR0|adulteration of saffron. Cheap,
20110101142355.500|20110101142358.000|TR0|fake brands of saffron sell
20110101142358.000|20110101142400.500|TR0|briskly here on the streets of
20110101142400.500|20110101142403.000|TR0|Srinagar. And it is virtually
20110101142403.000|20110101142405.500|TR0|impossible for you and me to
20110101142405.500|20110101142408.000|TR0|distinguish between these and
20110101142408.000|20110101142410.500|TR0|the real thing. This has dented
20110101142410.500|20110101142413.000|TR0|saffron's image, and resulted in
20110101142413.000|20110101142415.500|TR0|a drop in prices."
20110101142415.500|20110101142418.000|TR0|
20110101142418.000|20110101142420.500|TR0|The availability of cheaper
20110101142420.500|20110101142423.000|TR0|saffron from Iran and Spain has
20110101142423.000|20110101142425.500|TR0|added to the problem. With
20110101142425.500|20110101142428.000|TR0|credibility at stake, traders
20110101142428.000|20110101142430.500|TR0|like Gulzar Ahmed now refuse to
20110101142430.500|20110101142433.000|TR0|stock saffron.
20110101142433.000|20110101142435.500|TR0|
20110101142435.500|20110101142438.000|TR0|"When one cannot be sure of the
20110101142438.000|20110101142440.500|TR0|quality, why should I stock it?
20110101142440.500|20110101142443.000|TR0|Nobody can guarantee whether
20110101142443.000|20110101142446.333|TR0|it's genuine, so there's not
20110101142446.333|20110101142449.667|TR0|much demand. If the government
20110101142449.667|20110101142453.000|TR0|is ready to authenticate what is
20110101142453.000|20110101142455.500|TR0|genuine saffron, then I will
20110101142455.500|20110101142458.000|TR0|stock it."
20110101142458.000|20110101142500.500|TR0|
20110101142500.500|20110101142503.000|TR0|But there are those who still
20110101142503.000|20110101142505.500|TR0|swear by saffron. Houseboat
20110101142505.500|20110101142508.000|TR0|owner Bashir Dandoo has saffron
20110101142508.000|20110101142510.500|TR0|every morning, especially in
20110101142510.500|20110101142513.000|TR0|winter.
20110101142513.000|20110101142515.500|TR0|
20110101142515.500|20110101142518.000|TR0|"I add saffron to milk or have
20110101142518.000|20110101142520.500|TR0|it in rice dishes, because its
20110101142520.500|20110101142523.000|TR0|very good for one's health in
20110101142523.000|20110101142525.500|TR0|this cold weather. It helps
20110101142525.500|20110101142528.000|TR0|reduce chest congestion, and my
20110101142528.000|20110101142530.500|TR0|backache also goes away."
20110101142530.500|20110101142533.000|TR0|
20110101142533.000|20110101142535.500|TR0|That will bring some cheer to

20110101142540.500|20110101142543.000|TR0|prices. The government had

20110101142546.333|20110101142549.667|TR0|months ago to improve irrigation
